documents.document:
Good to see the Championship clubs creating a working party with the WRU
Needs of the amateur game very different to the pro
This'll help
@rippercbh @Mooro9 indeed, Ripper. I think Owen Williams' defence would be up to it.
@Mooro9 indeed Andy. Or Owen Williams. I'd love to see a second distributor at 12

Key to Wales performing well could be the selection at 13.
Not 7.
Jon Davies having a poor season by his standards.
@MikePullen1969 yup. Although Jonny Gray has the work rate of 2. Young Alun-Wyn Jones in the making.
@MikePullen1969 indeed, Mike. But I genuinely believe that the Scottish backline have four tries in them over 80 mins.

Don't understand the discord between Brisbane Tens organisers & NZRU
I know the rest periods for ABs & I live in Cardiff
#BrisbaneTens

Some @rbs_6_nations brain squirts
- Ireland won't beat Scotland - England won't beat Wales
Which means the slam is off for the big 2

Scot v Ire could spin the 6Ns on its head
By no means a given for Ireland
Scottish backline easily capable of scoring 4 tries
@Thesuperpig7 tricky. Plays/ played three positions to test standard. Not many can do that

Matt Giteau leaving is the last vertebrae of Toulon's 2012 spine being removed.
Hayman, Bakkies B, Wilkinson, Giteau.
Rebuild required.

In reality, 3 out of 5 @rbs_6_nations wins is a minimum requirement for Wales
2 home games and Italy away

Joe Marler must have been drinking Araldite for the past month
Awesome recovery from a leg fracture

Joe Marler being fit is a massive boost for England
Eddie J will be very happy with that

Can't wait for the @rbs_6_nations
Huge tournament for Rob Howley & his squad
Much will be decided as a result
@Rugbyworldmag Six Nations special out tomorrow 👊👊👊👊⬇️ https://t.co/kz8UKcY5tQ
@mikeyroberts81 I'm going for a full Prince Albert, Mike ☺️

I haven't played for 15 odd years.
Just bought a new DJ controller.
My midlife crisis is coming along swimmingl… https://t.co/zrTV1wAiU9

Having a clean out.
Came across this @JiffyRugby https://t.co/9bY0ln8kPf
@JamiePandaram what am I gonna do about ma legs..... Charlie Murphy.....?

Today is the 44th anniversary of 'that' Baa Baas' try
*deep breath*
Am I the only one that thinks it is overrated due to poor defence?

This week represents and unusual week of calm in Northern Hemisphere rugby.
Rare indeed.
@Murray_Kinsella @The42_ie was discussing the 'spiral' kick recently. Barry Davies and Lee Byrne could kick it 70m. Lost art/ weapon

Always find it weird that cocaine isn't treated as performance enhancing.
Odd.
@thescarletway indeed. But maybe it's time for him to reinvent himself. He can carry very well. His speed is underrated.
@Roarzz totally agree.
@olliewatkins @Roarzz weirdly. I'd like to see Jamie Roberts playing at 13. Allows for a distributor at 12 and a hole puncher - wider.
@Roarzz nope. Scott W should/ will start at 12. Also, wrong to blame Jamie Roberts. That's how he was told to play. And was awesome at it
@Roarzz indeed. Would love to see Warburton given less of a burden at the breakdown. Which will require less predicable lines from 12.
@DaleRiley3 bigstyle, Dale. Warburton is fast and has good hands. Sadly, during his career, he hasn't been played in that role.

Would love to see an unleashed Sam Warburton in the 6Ns
Not burdened with the 'jackal'
Carrying/ 'linking' like Hooper and Ardie Savea
@Rreesrugby @Rob_Whitefield indeed, gents. Horrible situation for the club and staff.

The loss of London Welsh is a reality check for many who have pro rugby aspirations in England and Wales
Who you were, counts for nothing

London Welsh.
Gone.
Rightly or wrongly.
Professional rugby doesn't do sentimentality.

Dr Sherylle Calder thinks that mobile phones may inhibit the awareness of England players
Some Tigers' players must be on Farmville 24/7

Great to see Will Boyde signing a new deal with the Scarlets.
He's having a fantastic season.

That is a good looking Ireland squad.
Strong spine.

Guy Noves -" Hi, it's Guy. Bastareaud is back in the squad"
Team Chef - "Thanks for heads up "
And this is why I love watching Matthew Morgan⬇️ https://t.co/k05rBcGRFB
@WillGreenwood @gregbthomas would also be surprised if Alun-Wyn Jones isn't captain
@WillGreenwood @gregbthomas I'll be stunned if Faletau and Liam Williams don't start.
Come on Connacht
@rugbydruid @WillGreenwood @SkySportsRugby no need for that Andrew
@WillGreenwood 's Lions team doesn't make pretty reading for Welsh supporters 😨⬇️ https://t.co/2mZnNf8SQO

Cardiff Blues & Ospreys avoiding each other in the Challenge Cup would be better for Welsh rugby
But it would make a belting 1/4 final 👊
I think 'Bull Shit Man' may require an apartment in the Washington area @rickygervais? https://t.co/S8BOxwed1e

Well, the first press briefing of the Trump presidency seems to have been well received.
No problems.
None at all.
Went down well....
@Owenins Hi Owen. They didn't lose. The game was called off

Weird stat alert.
Tigers conceded 43 points, yet missed just 11 tackles.
Had a completion of 92%.
Odd.

Leicester are starting to resemble those actual Tigers which repeatedly rock back and forth in a poorly run Russian zoo
#43nil #Tigers
Two good results for the Ospreys and Cardiff Blues 👌

I had no idea there were so many fights in baseball
Some absolute beauties in here⬇️
#RoidRage
https://t.co/QrUIU1nhui
Sounds as though Matthew Morgan had a good game today

Here it is again.
Bastareaud bringing the booooom! 👊⬇️ https://t.co/Miyu9q6W4d

Some truly awesome tackling from Saracens and Toulon.
Both technically and 'showtime' 👊
Here's the Bastareaud hit ⬇️😨😨😨 https://t.co/Bm49mGshvv
I bet Alex Lozowski's insides look like corned beef.

Holy. Crap.
Bastareaud with one of the biggest tackles I've ever seen.
Wow

Jackson Wray won't be far short of Man of the Match.
Carried well for Saracens.
@haydn_davies @LeeJarvis10 @rhys_patch @bazil15 had a belting spiral. It was like a remote controlled plane.

Toulon are minutes away from cracking.
Players already blowing after 32 minutes.

Some monster hits in the Saracens v Toulon game.
Man alive 👊👊👊

Itoje is definitely worth the hype.
He's a tremendous athlete.
Massive defensive display so far.
Still find it incredible that Juan Smith's career was so close to being written off in South Africa.

Saracens ball retention is immaculate.
So neat with the placement and cleanout
@andymcgeady shit his pants, that's why ☺️
Brilliant clean-out from Itoje.

Bonkers game at Clermont.
Enjoyably bonkers.

Fair play to Exeter.
Fantastic attitude in the second half.
Most teams would have rolled over and played dead.

Exeter are unrecognisable.
Clermont score a thirty yarder from first phase.
Blindside strolls over untouched under the posts.

Clermont with 5 tries in 40 minutes.
Awesome half.

Not often you see Exeter getting treated like this.
Clermont are absolutely destroying them.
So much space in the wide channels.

Five players who aren't going to enjoy the video session on Monday ⬇️
#Nadolo https://t.co/falvzvF9LW

Always found it weird that no rugby coach has set a backline in American Football's ' i formation'
Especially from… https://t.co/tHqK9INMqg

Common sense from the ref.
If Nacewa had been pinged for that...........

Very positive to see the WRU backing the 5 year residency qualification
Totally remodels the capture of players

If you want to hear an ego-maniac, with dodgy hair, talking nonsense to a nation
I'm on @swanseasound shortly talking about Welsh rugby
This ⬇️ https://t.co/yWVTkDu1Sj
@OnlyOneT ah, yes. I thought you meant deliberately weakened. Not injuries.

I have a sneaky feeling that Saracens are going to tear Toulon a new one this weekend
Toulon are way short of their 2013 glory days

Great to see Rhys Webb back for the Ospreys this weekend
The 'forgotten' scrum-half of British and Irish Lions debate
Classy nine

Good to see Nick Williams back for Cardiff Blues.
His carrying makes such a difference.

Love Eddie Jones' England squads.
Pack full of brawlers.
Back's full of ballers.
@talkMacca bigstyle, Macca. Impresses everytime I see him play.
@MikePullen1969 exactly Mike. I bet he's horrible to play against.

Good to see Ellis Genge back in the England squad
Aggressive, nasty, abrasive lump of a bloke
And sometimes that's exactly what you need

Check this out
Carlin Isles virtually 'jumping his height'
Bonkers⬇️ https://t.co/Ldrk8rqOJT

Can't wait for the Six Nations to start
Always seems like a formality before hand
With a clear favourite
Rarely is
@SebDuval can only presume that it's due to school's rugby, Seb?

Man alive.
Alibaba are chucking some cash into sports sponsorship
💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵

Interesting Rugby Player Population graphic ⬇️
Well worth a look
(Via @WorldRugby) https://t.co/OcwGT3Y9eG
@Tom4Jones dream coaching gig ☺️
@Tom4Jones ah I see. Yup, I presume most are sevens,Tom.
@joshtitothomas Wales approx 73000 players. Sri Lanka approx 740000
@Tom4Jones its total players. Not registered. As far as I am aware. Still weird ☺️

Here's a bizarre fact.
Sri Lanka has more rugby players than Wales.
Mind blown.
@Tom4Jones they'll be more likely to play for their nation of origin, Tom. Which would be great for the Pacific Island test teams?

Really hope rugby, as a whole, can adopt the 5 year residency rule.
Will hopefully slow the shameful pilfering of Pacific Island talent.
@Tom4Jones yup. That is a hurdle, Tom.
@CJR9587 yup. Could implement it themselves. Would love all of rugby to adopt it though. Would stop the pilfering of the Pacific Islands
